readable.title: 3527715826_ea5b4e8de4
readable.content: A girl , in a black shirt and hot pink pants , is about to hit a tennis ball on the court . A girl in pink flip flops and pants playing tennis . A girl trying to hit a ball in the air with a tennis racket on the tennis court . A girl wearing a black shirt and pink pants playing tennis on a tennis court . A girl wearing pink flip flops and tights is swinging a tennis racket at a tennis ball .
